website_summaries.verdict: Offers a good value in a two-pack and ships with a toothbrush. Fights plaque while freshening breath with beef flavor.
pros: Excellent price per ounce, and customers are pleased with how much toothpaste they receive
Owners report even picky dogs seem to like the taste of this beef toothpaste
cons: Some owners say included toothbrush doesn't work well
Some customers don't like the product being made outside the U.S

customer_reviews.title: Excellent For Cats, Too
customer_reviews.text: Our cat has really needed some serious attention to his teeth, so we purchased this kit. On the good side, it is a LARGE kit which has a decent supply of the paste itself. The tools included are also of a higher quality than most pet teeth cleaning items, so I believe that they will be durable and last a while - along with the big supply of paste! My only pick of the nit variety is that my feline distinctly dislikes the flavor. He ends up drooling for a bit after we have cleaned his teeth due to this. However, he still ends up with clean teeth, so it works perfectly well! I only wish there were other flavors.
customer_reviews.author: J. Current

customer_reviews.title: Works great on my dog that eats cow poop
customer_reviews.text: I didn't even realize it was a two pack of toothpaste. It comes with a brush and a finger brush. My dog was a little weirded out at first but loves the taste of the toothpaste. I bought this because we recently got 2 calves and are bottle feeding them. Baby cows have very "good smelling" poop. So my nasty dog likes to sneak in a few bites when I'm not paying attention to him. This works amazing. No one wants cow poop breath. His breath smells so much better now and hopefully I can keep him away from his favorite disgusting snack. (:
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Whiter Teeth and Better Breath After a Week
customer_reviews.text: Noticed that my 1 year old puppy's teeth were starting to turn yellow from tartar build up and his breath smelled rancid on a whole new level. He was hesitant about the taste of this toothpaste at first but wouldn't stop licking it. Eventually, I turned it into a game where he would try to bite the brush and I'd take full advantage and start brushing. His teeth were noticeably whiter and most of the tartar buildup are gone only after a week. His bad breath is gone as well. I used to think that giving him chew bones and dental treats were enough. But nothing substitutes for a good brushing. Definitely need to get this and start early!
customer_reviews.author: Reggie

customer_reviews.title: Says Sulfate-Free yet has Sulfates!!
customer_reviews.text: When you advertise that your product is Natural, and BPA and Sulfate-free and then I look at the ingredients and the seventh ingredient in the toothpaste is Sodium Lauryl Sulfate then that’s false advertising and a lie! The main reason I purchased this toothpaste was that it was supposed to not have any crappy chemicals and ingredients in it!
customer_reviews.author: Julia Kelly

customer_reviews.title: GREAT TOOL
customer_reviews.text: I really didn't think my dog would let me brush his molars, but he loves the taste of the paste so much that he lets me!! I just got him as a rescue, and his molars were covered in tarter. This had made a huge difference in his teeth They look great now. Just introduce your pup to it slowly. Let him taste it and then put the small brush into the front of his mouth until he accepts it. Then get him used to letting you put your fingers in his mouth to hold his checks away from his molars. Before you know it, he will let you brush his molars.
customer_reviews.author: bm

customer_reviews.title: Success!
customer_reviews.text: Beef flavored toothpaste?!?!? What dog can resist that flavor?As mentioned in the instructions, place a small amount on your finger and let your pooch get a quick taste. Both of my dogs loved it! They thought it was a treat. Thankfully I was able to brush their teeth w/ no problems, b/c I was worried I'd have to wrestle them to get the toothbrush in their mouths. If anything, they wanted more when I was finished. Anything to keep their teeth nice and healthy.
customer_reviews.author: MMendrun

customer_reviews.title: actually liked this. I let her taste the paste then ...
customer_reviews.text: My dog, who is very picky and won't eat food flavored treats, etc. actually liked this. I let her taste the paste then put some on the long brush to brush her teeth. she let me brush for about a minute before she got annoyed. She is 8 years old and this was the 1st time she brushed her teeth. Came packaged in a nice box, good to wrap for xmas. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Patty

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this! Toothbrush is easy to use in dogs mouth and they seem to like the toothpaste. The tubes come with A LOT! I certainly recommend this product to anyone wanting to do doggy dental care at home!
customer_reviews.author: lauren

customer_reviews.title: This toothpaste and toothbrush combo is a great price! Both my dogs seem to like the ...
customer_reviews.text: This toothpaste and toothbrush combo is a great price! Both my dogs seem to like the toothpaste and the toothbrushes work well. The tubes of paste are large...you get a lot of product for the price!
customer_reviews.author: KimberlyAlice

customer_reviews.title: The dog approves!
customer_reviews.text: Holy cow this comes with a lot of toothpaste! Everything works great and my dog absolutely loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Stinson

customer_reviews.title: I'm not a huge fan of the fingerbrush like I thought I would be but I love this ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a huge fan of the fingerbrush like I thought I would be but I love this product. Such a great deal for a lot of toothpaste! And my dog likes it so it's perfect. Unlike, most of the reviews here--or at least the reviews I read--I did not get this product for free, I chose to buy it. I think it's a good price for a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Lou

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended. Read the review :)
customer_reviews.text: One of my best amazon purchases. When we traveled I had to get a different toothpaste at Petco because they took this one away at the airport. I paid 14$ for it, it was very sticky and left white sticky white marks on my hand every time we've used it. This toothpaste is amazing. I can't belive that for 7$ we got two full size toothpastes and a toothbrush and a finger brush. It's surely improved my dog breath from the very first time used. I couldn't believe it. And I can tell that my dog love the flavor of it she will let use almost comfortably brush her teeth when I use this toospate. Absolutely great product.
customer_reviews.author: dori

customer_reviews.title: Hope it works for my dog.
customer_reviews.text: 3 stars for now because I just received the Toothpaste set,but so far my Labrador/Terrier mix likes the taste..he doesn't like new things being put in his mouth,like the tooth brushes lol but I can help him get over that I'll update my review when I see if there's any difference in my baby boy's teeth but overall the Toothpaste set arrived early Amazing!! UPDATE: 5/9/2020..freshens my dog's breath and he loves the taste of beef flavor he doesn't like his teeth brished,but u can't blame him because he's never had his teeth brushed before,until the day the toothbrush and toothpaste set arrived..Thank God I decided to start before any cavities immurged..definitely recommend this product and the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Thelma J.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful packaging, with extras. But NOPE.
customer_reviews.text: This really would've been a great product. It's packaged like a gift item, with two full-sized tubes, a two-ended toothbrush, and a finger brush. I tried brushing my dog's teeth with it, but he made a choking sound and flat out refused it. He is not new to toothbrushing. It promises "beef flavor", but there was no beef smell. It didn't have any distinctive smell at all. I felt it between my fingers. It felt like the gooey consistency of human toothpaste, not most dog toothpastes, which are a bit more slippery. It went back to Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: garagon

customer_reviews.title: Simply UNUSABLE!
customer_reviews.text: I waited too long before trying this product, so I can't send it back. The first squeeze of toothpaste came out of the tube separated and gooey. So, I think it was on the shelf a long time! Smelled SO WEIRD to my dog (and me) that she wouldn't get near it after one sniff. I've had other pet toothpaste and my dogs at least liked the taste. Tried the brushes---USELESS---couldn't even get the finger brush on my small finger. It's hard plastic and simply unuable! The long brush is too soft, finger brush too hard, toothpaste hideous!!!
customer_reviews.author: healinghands

customer_reviews.title: The toothbrush that comes with it is good quality, though
customer_reviews.text: This is probably not a flaw in the toothpaste itself, but my dogs comically refuse to let me brush their teeth when I try to use this product, and will only let me do so with chicken-flavored toothpaste. The toothbrush that comes with it is good quality, though. I may find someone with dogs that are not as prissy as mine, and see if they can get some use out of it. It's a good value for the money. A lot of toothpaste for a fraction of the cost of the one my dogs prefer.
customer_reviews.author: Elmyr

customer_reviews.title: Yuck
customer_reviews.text: Apparently, this stuff is as appealing to dogs as it sounds to me. I have two dogs, and neither would get near this toothpaste after the first sniff. Rated one start for flavor because they don't like it. One star for ease of use because you try brushing a dog's teeth with something he hates. And one star for value because it's going straight into the trash.
customer_reviews.author: shopper

customer_reviews.title: and he seems to like the flavor
customer_reviews.text: I've used this a couple times with my dog, and he seems to like the flavor. However, it seems that there's no easy way to clean a dog's teeth - my dog just wants to lick and bite the brush. I haven't tried the long handled brush yet, but I've used the brush that fits over your finger. It works ok, but I wish there was a way to insert toothpaste into the toothbrush so it's harder to lick off.
customer_reviews.author: KelTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Buy this, it works
customer_reviews.text: I was very skeptical because I’d tried other toothpaste on my dog. They didn’t seem to work, it wasn’t fair to her to try and force her to let me brush her teeth. She’ll be 10 this year and I’m not willing to submit her to a general anesthetic unless absolutely necessary. I’m stunned by how well this works. It’s only been a week, and although she still hates her teeth being brushed she at least sits there. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: No

customer_reviews.title: Works fine, but dog hates the toothpaste
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item in an attempt to help with my dog's bad breath issues. I had previously purchased a mint toothpaste that she hated, so I thought trying a new type/flavor might do the trick. Unfortunately, I was wrong. She still will not touch the toothpaste, and although she's very good with having her mouth/teeth handled, she's not very cooperative when she hates the flavor. I'll have to keep looking.
customer_reviews.author: happyfeet

customer_reviews.title: My dog doesn't like it at all
customer_reviews.text: The price and the toothbrush isn't bad,but the taste of the toothpaste must be horrible for my dog. My dog doesn't like this toothpaste at all. It looks like normal toothpaste for humans...white. It doesn't smell like it has a taste. I recommend to get toothpaste with peanut flavor or similar. This toothpaste you can only use for a dog with experience in using toothbrush and toothpaste,and if the dog is really patient.
customer_reviews.author: Hummelmonster

customer_reviews.title: My pups like it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to brush my two older Dachshunds teeth. They have been used to other brands/flavors that I've brushed them with over the years and adjusted to this one just fine. One still "asks" for teeth to be brushed after breakfast, so I think she enjoys the flavor of this paste just as much as others. Pricewise, it's an awesome deal and includes the two tubes, a finger brush, and two-ended brush.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: My Dog HATES it
customer_reviews.text: My dogs hates it. I just to give him another brand, and he would let me brush his teeth and irritated gums because it tasted good for him. However, this brand he hates the flavor and starts rejecting it. I am going back to my brand, and I al returning this!
customer_reviews.author: Carla.V

customer_reviews.title: Unsure about Safety
customer_reviews.text: Returned after it was received. Unclear based on reviews online and packaging received, whether it was made in the USA or made in China. I do NOT feed products to my dogs made in China. The finger toothbrush also seemed to have black speckles on the bristles and in the plastic itself so unsure if it was a design defect or not but made me suspicious.
customer_reviews.author: CPatterTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Success!
customer_reviews.text: My 20 lb PBGV mix dog had to have dental surgery due to tarter buildup and rotten teeth. It was not cheap. So - we decided to try and start brushing his teeth. Surprisingly, he was cooperative. As of today, we have been brushing his teeth nightly for over a year. I took him to the vet today for his yearly checkup and there was NO tarter or plaque on his teeth. The vet was so impressed and I am so pleased.
customer_reviews.author: M. More

customer_reviews.title: Gets rid of death breath
customer_reviews.text: Hi everyone I wanted to write a review about this toothbrush and toothpaste kit. My mini dachshund has death breath !!! At first Tucker was hesitant about having his teeth brushed, but with this toothpaste and soft bristled toothbrush it was an easy cleaning. The death breath went away a few minutes after brushing his teeth. We usually do his teeth every other day and the fresh breath last for days afterwards. I would recommend this to anyone else who has a dog or dogs with death breath lol. Affordable and easy to get their teeth cleaned.
customer_reviews.author: megan lyskawa

customer_reviews.title: The Best Flavor and "Enzyme Action" Our Addie Does Not Run Away From!!
customer_reviews.text: Our local store stopped carrying its version of pet toothpaste, so I checked Amazon and found this wonderful, low-cost, option. I am glad I did as Addie does not struggle to get away from her toothbrushing anymore. In the 10-days we have used this product Addie's oral health has improved dramatically. We have seen the same "basic" product for sale in our Vet's office for three times the cost, and one only get's one tube, plus the brushes are sold separately!!! I highly recommend this particular option as our dog would give the product "Five-woof's" too!!! Great deal Amazon, please do not lose this vendor!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Lee

customer_reviews.title: Works good. Recommended
customer_reviews.text: The brush has nice, soft bristles and seems to be durable as our boy does chew on it while we brush and bites down pretty hard. Can't say how the toothpaste tastes because I'm definitely not going to try it. I believe it's tolerable enough as our pup was curious enough to lick it after smelling it. Definitely notice how much better his breath smells after using. Overall a good deal and would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie Cervantes

customer_reviews.title: Great toothpaste!!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried to use doggy toothpaste before with no success. This time I tried this one on my 2 dogs & they have allowed me to brush their teeth with no problems. They have even licked the end of the tube which has never happened with other brands. I bought this one because the kit had the largest tubes of toothpaste. Hope the company continues to make the large tubes for multi pet homes. I had my dogs' teeth professionally cleaned before I started using the product, so my dogs didn't experience any pain from needing their teeth cleaned. Happy with the results so far.
customer_reviews.author: 7Kitty_Kats

customer_reviews.title: Dogs don't like it
customer_reviews.text: It seemed like a good deal, the price was right, the ingredients were fine, it was packaged nicely. But my 3 dogs snubbed their noses at it. In defence of the product, my dogs are used to chicken flavored toothpaste. Switching to beef surprised them. So if your dog likes beef flavor, give it a try
customer_reviews.author: lucky clover

customer_reviews.title: SO FAR, SO GOOD
customer_reviews.text: I WAS buying Dr's Foster and Smith toothpaste for dogs and it totally disappeared and then I found this stuff. The tubes are GIANT...bigger than human toothpaste tubes and sure to last awhile, even with my 4 dogs' daily brushing routine. I believe it has some sort of oxide in it because it's the WHITEST toothpaste I've ever found for dogs. The chicken-esque scent is a little faint but my dogs, maybe out of habit, allow me to brush them with it and then lick the brush clean when I'm done.
customer_reviews.author: JOHN

customer_reviews.title: All 3 animals tolerate it!
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 cats and 1 dog. I love that this toothpaste can be used for all of them. I was anticipating having a hard time at least starting this with them, but it went better than expected. The scent is mild so I'm not offended by it (I was a little weirded out by the idea of beef flavored toothpaste), and the animals all were curious about it, licked it, and allowed me to brush their teeth. Win win!
customer_reviews.author: Mamanda

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money and time
customer_reviews.text: Great taste that makes it easier to introduce to dogs. I have an 8 and 9 year old dog and they both hate getting their teeth cleaned. I’ve been working with them for about a week now with this and it seems to be going well. I can already tell a difference in their teeth and gums. Be sure not to brush too hard or too long cause can make dogs gum bleed if they aren’t used to getting it brushed. I wish the bristles were a bit softer, but overall for the price it was great!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor I.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value
customer_reviews.text: Much better than the more expensive toothpaste. The results as compared with the red tube stuff we had been using on our dog's teeth has been dramatic. We are on our second buy of this product. Very good value as you get two tubes rather than just one plus a great brush designed for a dog's teeth. We are big fans or this toothpaste and will order it again.
customer_reviews.author: fish0143

customer_reviews.title: PRODUCT VERY NICE, CAT NOT IMPRESSED TO MUCH
customer_reviews.text: FIRST ATTEMPT WAS A LITTLE DIFFICULT, BUT I DID GET SOME IN HER MOUTH AND SHE SEEMED TO LIKE THE FLAVOR, BUT IN ALL HONESTY WHO HAS EVER TRIED WITH SUCCESS TO BRUSH THEIR CATS TEETH,? BUT THE PRODUCT CAME WITH 2 TUBES OF PASTE AND A TOOTHBRUSH WITH A SMALL BRUSH FOR YOUR CAT AND ALSO ONE TO PUT ON YOUR FINGER, I WILL KEEP TRYING, AT LEAST TO HAVE HER LICK SOME FOR THE ENZYMES, HANNAH SAYS THATS WHAT YOU THINK MOM LOL
customer_reviews.author: Susan E. Roe

customer_reviews.title: While she hated the process
customer_reviews.text: This was the first time we brushed our pup's teeth. While she hated the process, I don't think she minded the toothpaste taste. Warning: your dog's breath will IMMEDIATELY smell like tuna. I mean, fresh fresh fresh fresh out of the can TUNA. But, the next morning she had completely white clean teeth and her breath didn't smell like anything. I'm glad we got this product :)
customer_reviews.author: Mika

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My puppy really enjoys the chicken flavor and seems to be happy when it’s time to brush his teeth. The only improvement I would add to this brush is add a front and back bristle so it can brush more teeth in half the time. The toothbrush does have different sized bristles on both ends of the brush, but a puppy only has so much patience before it wants to just chew on the brush.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Dai

customer_reviews.title: Great toothpaste
customer_reviews.text: My dog really likes it, it has a subtle beef smell so it doesn't bother me at all! It cleans well and it's good value for the money. My only complaint is that it comes with only 1 toothbrush for 2 big tubes of paste. I don't need to use the finger attachment but it seems fine.
customer_reviews.author: Eva

customer_reviews.title: Great value and product!
customer_reviews.text: We recently purchased these for our two cairn terriers. The toothbrushes, although a little big for them, are soft enough they can chew them. They love the toothpaste! The peanut butter is a clear favorite but the beef is great too. I’ve never had any trouble getting them to take these and that’s surprising because they are super picky! A great choice for puppy dental care and fast shipping!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Presnell

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love this toothpaste. Really like that is natural, healthy toothpaste. Both my dogs love the taste and lick it as much as they can. Big size for a cheap price is a bonus. Over ordered it twice
customer_reviews.author: Michael Whelan JR

customer_reviews.title: A+ from our Vet
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this toothpaste with 3 of my pups for over 4 years. Every vet check up my pup goes thru....his comment is always A+ on your pups teeth because they are so clean and well maintained. I would recommend this product to dog owners who want to have good healthy teeth and gums for their furry friend.
customer_reviews.author: CMOS

customer_reviews.title: My two Shih tzu's love this toothpaste.
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great product and the price is even better. My two furry boys just love this toothpaste and they even look forward to their daily brushing. I did not give it any rating for flavor due to the fact that I have not tasted it. However, if my boys are any indication of how much they love it, then it must tase very good. You will be impressed with this toothpaste. Great buy...
customer_reviews.author: Superman

customer_reviews.title: Made in PRC
customer_reviews.text: My dog didn't like this beef flavored toothpaste. Difficult to apply on toothbrushe due to its consistency. Got scared upon checking where it's made, people's republic of china. I guess my dog smelled that there's a bad ingredients in it.
customer_reviews.author: Marky

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using a big name brand for my Maltipoo for years. I saw an improvement in plaque and stains within two weeks. The amount in the tubes is so much more than other brands. The long handle brush is great! She won’t let me use the finger tip brush. This will last quite a while.
customer_reviews.author: Eastkoy

customer_reviews.title: Dog loves it.
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves to have her teeth brushed. Loves the taste of the toothpaste. Great product. Her teeth are whiter and almost all the tarter is gone.
customer_reviews.author: tmartin9776

customer_reviews.title: Finger brush terrible !!
customer_reviews.text: I picked this kit because I needed toothpaste and mainly for the finger scrubber. The finger toothbrush body is stiff, and won’t go all the way on your finger so you can’t feel where you are touching the dogs teeth and the bristles are too stiff. For these reasons I don’t recommend this set, I now have to spend more money to get the product I needed!
customer_reviews.author: Janice P.

customer_reviews.title: I personally loved it! My vet recommended
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this over a month ago and I don’t understand how can people not love this product? It took away all the plague and yellow parts off my dogs teeth. It’s just amazing and the haters can stay away become I for sure will purchase this product anytime i need a refill. I even asked my vets opinion and he said he recommended this product to many people! I think the money it’s worth the excellent quality this product has to offer!!!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Dog likes the taste
customer_reviews.text: Our dog likes the taste of the toothpaste. We have a 6-month border collie/mix and she warmed up to the taste right away and has even started to like getting her teeth brushed. The different toothbrushes also work well for different sizes of dogs. One thing to note, the packaging says "SULFATE - FREE", but the product contains sodium lauryl sulfate. I'm guessing you guys meant to put " SULFITE - FREE" instead? (Note the "ite" instead of "ate").
customer_reviews.author: Mike Hill

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok but you have to train your pup
customer_reviews.text: It’s ok, I didn’t use it much because I lost it within a couple weeks so that’s my fault. But it arrived quick and the toothebrush is nice but the paste smelled bad to me. My pup loved it and just kept licking the stuff off before I could get to her teethe. It smelled like beef...I wish I got the mint flavor lol the purpose was so that her breath can smell good to me
customer_reviews.author: logan

customer_reviews.title: MADE IN THE PEOPLES REPUBLIC OF CHINA
customer_reviews.text: Would not use this product on my dogs, once I realized that it was made in the Peoples Republic of China. Unfortunately, item had already shipped. Rather than paying the shipping to return, product is being thrown in the trash. Only gave the 1 star rating, as could not submit with 0 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Charles M. Pollari

customer_reviews.title: I like that it is beef flavored for him but still ...
customer_reviews.text: I like that it is beef flavored for him but still manage to have the clean toothpaste smell. The pup doesn't quite let me brush him yet but we are making progress. More treats and time will finally let me brush his teeth.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: TOXIC FOR DOGS
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this toothpaste on my 10 year old Pom for 3 months. I couldn’t figure out what is making my dog sick. Lethargic, stopped eating food, and her fur to fall out. When I bought this the few reviews I read were all positive. Today I went back and read the reviews again and sure enough. It’s this toothpaste. Heartbreaking to watch your beloved pet go through this. And also to have to pay the vet bills. Please don’t buy. Amazon please discontinue selling it. Very Toxic. :(
customer_reviews.author: patrice schulman

customer_reviews.title: Love this !
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Our dog doesnt mind his teeth being cleaned but definitely prefers the brush that comes with this packet. He goes crazy over the taste and thinks it is a treat, so is happy to lie down while we brush as he crazily licks away! If consistent in use, we have seen good results so far!
customer_reviews.author: Kate S

customer_reviews.title: good buy compared to dept/ retail stores
customer_reviews.text: As described, 2 pack tooth paste and finger brush double ended tooth brush. As far as beef flavor and the 2 pooches like it, not sure, what dog likes their teeth brushed. They gum it and I manage to scrub, they don't act like it bothers them taste wise.
customer_reviews.author: whoopsieriot

customer_reviews.title: Strong Brush + Great Flavor = Happy Dog
customer_reviews.text: I kept reading about brushing your dogs teeth and how it’s supposed to be good for their health, but didn’t think my dog would be ok with me going in there with a brush. I got this set and my dog loves the flavor and doesn’t complain. She thinks it’s a treat with how good it tastes, and the brushes are well made and the perfect size. The smaller one I use for the front teeth, and switch to the bigger one for the back teeth. It’s strong enough to withstand her biting down a couple times, and does the job well!
customer_reviews.author: Student of Life

customer_reviews.title: Good product & price
customer_reviews.text: My rescue probably never had her teeth brushed before so at 6 years of age she wasn't too enthused with my sticking my finger in her mouth. However, once she tasted the paste, she did allow me to brush her teeth and gums. I've been successful with the finger brush, which has rubber bristles and is constructed to fit various size fingers.
customer_reviews.author: C. G.

customer_reviews.title: My dog loved it...can’t say the same for my cat
customer_reviews.text: My dog doesn’t mind having her teeth brushed, she seems to enjoy the flavor of this toothpaste. My cat on the other hand held a grudge because I dared to try to brush his teeth. Not the product’s fault, though. It’s helpful that it comes with both sizes of brushes for people like me who have a larger dog and a small cat.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna

customer_reviews.title: Not the best
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't recommend this for small dogs. I have a shih tzu & the finger brush was too tough for his gums. The regular brush is fine with the smaller end & the bristles on that were soft. However, the paste itself smells like chemicals & was really thick.
customer_reviews.author: Garrett

customer_reviews.title: I’m sure it’s a fine product and you get a lot of product for ...
customer_reviews.text: I’m sure it’s a fine product and you get a lot of product for the price. But my grown dogs would not tolerate my attempt of good hygiene. My senior Rat Terrier tried to bite me...first time ever. My young Jack Russell disappeared for 2 hours under the bed. Lesson learned: Don’t drink Adult Bevarages and shop Amazon!!
customer_reviews.author: Becky C Stonecipher

customer_reviews.title: Will purchase again
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my chihuahua who is very picky, shes not thrilled on brushing her teeth but she loves the flavor will try to lick it off the brush before it touches her teeth. The finger brush is very easy to use with her and it's getting easier to coax her since she loves the taste. Will purchase again. Haven't tried the long brush but plan on it with my other dog, the finger brush Rush is easy to clean and soft.
customer_reviews.author: .....amy w

customer_reviews.title: A bargain!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great deal! No dog likes to get their teeth brushed, no matter how great the toothpaste is. But I love this toothpaste - it smells great and gets the job done. The finger toothbrush could be a bit softer, though. Overall, this is a wonderful bargain.
customer_reviews.author: Ennit

customer_reviews.title: Great for dogs AND cats!
customer_reviews.text: This product was really great - I use it for both my sphynx cats AND my australian shepherd. The cats are not huge fans, but ... what cat would be?! the small finger brush is perfect for the cats while the larger brush works perfect for the dog. don’t want to let my animals teeth get nasty and become a problem - this is the perfect product for that
customer_reviews.author: Reynas 𖠰

customer_reviews.title: Good toothpaste my dog loves
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves the taste of this toothpaste! Now she gets excited at the sight of the bottle. The toothbrush is decent. It’s just really hard to brush my dog’s back teeth. Also, this toothpaste doesn’t give my dog minty smelling breath or anything like that. It does get the job done though and that’s what’a most important!
customer_reviews.author: Ames

customer_reviews.title: Our dogs hate the tastes
customer_reviews.text: our dogs hate the taste. I'll go back to the old brand to avoid the fight each night.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Nero

customer_reviews.title: Great doggie toothpaste!
customer_reviews.text: I never thought I could be successful brushing my two dachshund's teeth. But this product certainly helps, as they love the taste. They don't run when I come around with the toothbrush!
customer_reviews.author: april'smom

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves the flavor
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves the beef flavor of this toothpaste. I have tried other ones and she refuses to allow me to brush her teeth. When she smells this toothpaste she starts licking it like she thinks it is a treat.
customer_reviews.author: Irene Verdream

customer_reviews.title: Not Enzymatic, False advertising!
customer_reviews.text: Even though this tooth paste says it’s enzymatic in the description. I confirmed with the seller on their website that this tooth paste IS NOT ENZYMATIC. Definitely would not recommended if you are looking for an enzymatic tooth paste for your dog.
customer_reviews.author: Snowboarder1

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately the dog HATES it
customer_reviews.text: At the time of unboxing, this product should be 5 stars (cute packaging, incredible value, organic ingredients) but I can't give them as the dog hates it. Alvin doesn't hate all toothpastes but he's incredibly expressive about his dislike for this one, so it renders it useless for our purposes.
customer_reviews.author: LMac

customer_reviews.title: Amazing value and quality product.
customer_reviews.text: Very good value for money on this product. An enzymatic toothpaste (2 tubes) with quality brushes all in a good package. The toothpaste has been very good and I'm finally able to brush my dog's teeth with this. The brush is of good quality as well. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: A.M.

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: I have two labradors who love toys and will eat ANYTHING. I bought this to use with a dog-toy that was supposed to clean their teeth. Neither of them would come near it. I confess I didn't taste it myself, but it must be awful.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Awesome toothpaste, My Okee loves the taste
customer_reviews.text: Awesome toothpaste, My Okee loves the taste, which allows me to brush his teeth longer. I received two large tubes of paste at a very low price along with a double ended toothbrush that I use for my dogs back and front teeth. i also received a finger toothbrush...The price is very affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Irene Tamez

customer_reviews.title: Great value and works
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this. He hates getting his teeth brushed but allows it because he loves the taste. It brightens his teeth and helps reduce the plaque.
customer_reviews.author: Rayray

customer_reviews.title: Works great !
customer_reviews.text: Dog loves it ! He bugged me so much I brushed his teeth twice { ; Did see a negative review about some of the ingredients caused problems, did some checking and could not validate there claim.
customer_reviews.author: Wm  Jameson

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for my fur babies!!
customer_reviews.text: So happy I finally bought this! I have a cat and a dog and their breath has been brutal lately. I got my puppy treats that didn’t help at all!!! I finally decided it’s time to get them something for oral care. So I decided to go with this and extremely happy I did! My puppy absolutely loved it! I Was really hoping the finger brush would be rubbery because usually my kitty loved when I massage her gums, but she didn’t like the brush at all. So I’ll definitely be replacing it. But overall great buy for my fur babies :)
customer_reviews.author: jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Great deal and my dog's like the flavor!
customer_reviews.text: We brush our dogs teeth regularly so we often run out of toothpaste for them. The tubes sold at the pet store are pretty small so we finally took a chance and ordered Paws and Pals. So glad we did. The bottle is much larger than what we can get at the pet store and the price was reasonable. Bonus the dogs both like the flavor (even if they still hate getting their teeth brushed). Both tubes has lasted us a long time. We'll be reordering this one again!
customer_reviews.author: Christina DeLaPena

customer_reviews.title: Dog loves it- caviler spaniel
customer_reviews.text: I guess the flavor is good- dog is licking it off toothbrush lol. Very good and I love the toothbrush that comes with one large brush and a small brush on the other side to the back teeth. Totally recommend
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: My dogs run from this stuff
customer_reviews.text: My dogs hate this stuff. They actually leave the room when I bring it near them. I've never seen either of them react to anything like this before. Waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Brett Ogin

customer_reviews.title: Awesome stuff
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t even realize when I bought this that it was 2 tubes of toothpaste, talk about a bonus win! The multi tip brush works great, I have a pitbull so the smaller end is perfect for her front teeth and the larger size works better for her back teeth. She also used to fight me to brush her teeth but I guess she likes the taste of this way better because we have no issues! Would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Posdzich

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Our dog is getting a little older and his breath seems to get a little worse. So far its been easy to use with the items we purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Krishna K

customer_reviews.title: No fights!
customer_reviews.text: my dog put up a little fuss at first, but then he allowed me to brush his teeth.. he actually enjoyed the taste.. great product!
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: It's tooth paste and my dog loves it.
customer_reviews.text: Overall great product. My dog likes the toothpaste flavor better than previous paste I was using. The brush has two ends which I use for the front and back teeth! It's ALOT of toothpaste so it will be a while before buy again months later.
customer_reviews.author: RaZa

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and he didn't hate the taste!
customer_reviews.text: My dog has a tiny mouth and hates being fussed with, pills, or me doing anything around his face, but this he didn't mind. He licks his lips when we're done and doesn't fuss at all. This product is wonderful and so easy to use. The toothbrush having the two sizes was awesome for tiny or large teeth! :)
customer_reviews.author: Dakotah

customer_reviews.title: My dogs hate it
customer_reviews.text: It's a good value for the money. The tubes of toothpaste are huge. The toothpaste is white even though it says beef flavor and there's no smell but my dogs hate it
customer_reviews.author: GabbyinOk

customer_reviews.title: A waste
customer_reviews.text: Expensive, and my pets hate it. Even using the tips listed. My dog vomits every time I even try. The parts are awkwardly sized for my medium sized dog. Much too big and long.
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: no grrrood
customer_reviews.text: Steer clear of these. Very cheaply made and your dog will run the other way....
customer_reviews.author: Krish

customer_reviews.title: Dog mouth hygiene,  will help me save 500 in the future.
customer_reviews.text: Great product, does what is told however this product does not leave your dogs breath mint fresh like human toothpaste. Also dogs don't typically like their teeth being brushed but papa knows best. I recently took my dog to get her mouth cleaned. As a owner I never thought Dogs needed their teeth brushed since they don't eat candy. Did i learn after a 500 dollar teeth cleaning. Now my dogs Has pearly whites which I plan on her keeping for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander G.

customer_reviews.title: Dogs like the taste
customer_reviews.text: Dogs like it. I brush my dogs' teeth on a regular basis and the consistency of this toothpaste is great because it stays on the brush, then on their teeth, for as long as I need to brush. They really seem to like the flavor, which makes the whole process very easy. Thanks Paws & Pals
customer_reviews.author: avid reader

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this! He allows me to brush his teeth nightly. No fights, no problems. He likes the flavor, and it seems to be making a big difference.
customer_reviews.author: Las Cruces Folks

customer_reviews.title: Good price!
customer_reviews.text: I gave this 4 stars on flavor and scent because I don't know if it tastes good, my dogs don't have a problem with it. I use it everyday and I'm glad I found them.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene

customer_reviews.title: Solid product.
customer_reviews.text: Our dog does not enjoy having his teeth brushed, which makes this product even better because it comes with a couple toothbrush options for whatever difficulty we encounter.
customer_reviews.author: snowvalley

customer_reviews.title: Flavor is a winner
customer_reviews.text: As much as I dislike brushing my teeth and so does my dog, my dog some how always comes back to me as soon as I put some toothpaste on the brush. That tells you something. My dog really like this flavor. If your dog doesn't like their teeth getting brushed like mine does, this toothpaste should do the trick.
customer_reviews.author: J.J.

customer_reviews.title: Efficent
customer_reviews.text: This is the only toothpaste I have used that my dog doesn't run away from. He doesn't *enjoy* it but I don't have to fight him. It cuts down on his bad breath some but has a strange after-smell. I really like the smaller finger brush.
customer_reviews.author: Red

customer_reviews.title: No more bad breath.
customer_reviews.text: Works great for my smaller dogs, dogs like the taste and aren't bothered by the brushes. Does help with bad breath and I've noticed less buildup. The brushes are a bit small for my larger german shepherd.
customer_reviews.author: doxiegirl

customer_reviews.title: Good product, I think. My dog hated it.
customer_reviews.text: It's a good quality product. Definitely worth the money. Well packaged too. My only problem is.. my dog smelled the toothpaste and proceeded to act like the world was going to come to an end if it got in his mouth. That's his problem though, to be fair to the product. So we are looking for a different kind of product.
customer_reviews.author: JamesS

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves it
customer_reviews.text: Got this and was ready to be in for a fight, but I followed the instructions and my dog actually gets excited about his weekly teeth cleaning. The hardest part of getting his teeth brushed is that he won't stop trying to lick the toothpaste long enough for me to get to the hard to reach spots.
customer_reviews.author: metasynergy

customer_reviews.title: YESSS Finally!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love the flavor! They actually let me brush their teeth! I have yet to see if this works, but so far, it seems like it! And it comes with 2 tubes!! Mine arrived a little damaged but still works! I think it's just too hot out and the tube exploded.
customer_reviews.author: maud de proost

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: We just came from the vet and had great reviews! For someone who doesn't brush her dogger regularly, I think that says a lot about this product. My pup didn't mind the taste. Bristles were soft.
customer_reviews.author: Lena's Mum

customer_reviews.title: Seems like a good quality product
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a good quality product, but the description does not say it is Made In China, which it is.
customer_reviews.author: AA

customer_reviews.title: Dogs don't mind getting their teeth brushed
customer_reviews.text: This is a great buy. Two tubes of beef flavor toothpaste. Then a finger brush and a two sided regular brush. The dogs do not seem to mind too much when they get this done, since they go away with the beef flavor mouth.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: The best !
customer_reviews.text: The packaging was nice , the toothpaste was great, the kit was also! Great deal 2 for 1 ! And that the flavor is beef , my pup tolerates it more .
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

product_meta.title: Paws & Pals Dog Toothbrush - Pet Dental Care Kit with Brush, Tooth-Paste & Dual Finger Brush - Teeth Cleaning Set Best for Doggy, Cat, Puppy, Kitten - Beef Flavor - 7oz Tube - 2 Pack
feature_bullets: NON-STOP PROTECTION: Fights bad breath, tooth decay, tartar build-up, gum disease, and plaque.

CLEANS & REFRESHENS: Improve oral hygiene and restore the luster of your pet’s teeth with this powerful cleaning solution. Watch them smile because your pet will be showing off those pearly whites in no time.
GREAT TASTE: Our beef flavored toothpaste doesn’t just clean teeth and freshens the breath, it also tastes great! A wonderful cleaner for both dogs & cats.

EASY TO USE: Now you can be your pet’s personal dentist with our veterinarian-approved toothpaste set. Use the included toothbrushes to apply it directly onto their teeth, gum, and tongue to support your pet’s oral hygiene and cleanliness in between the annual cleanings provided by your vet.
PACK OF 2: Features two (2) 14-ounce tubes of toothpaste, one (1) dual-headed toothbrush, and one (1) fingertip toothbrush.
